entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023
